summary: Frontend testing of EaziWage UI updates completed successfully. All requested features are working: Contact page without interactive map, Partners page with partner logos and dark/light mode, Blog page with CEO article by Jason Crawford, Footer with Legal & Compliance section containing all 8 policy links, correct phone number (+254 72 315 4900), footer links scroll to top, and mobile/tablet responsiveness.
passed_tests: Contact page loads without interactive map
Contact page shows offices section with correct phone +254 72 315 4900
Contact page has Call Us card with +254 72 315 4900
Partners page renders with hero 'Grow With EaziWage'
Partners page shows 'Trusted by Industry Leaders' section
Partners page displays 8 partner logos/initials (Safaricom, KCB Bank, Equity Bank, MTN, Twiga Foods, Jumia, Glovo, Bolt)
Partners page dark/light mode toggle works correctly (theme class changes from 'light' to 'dark')
Blog page shows CEO article 'The Future of Earned Wage Access in Africa: 2026 Trends'
Blog page shows author Jason Crawford with 'CEO, EaziWage' role
Blog page shows December 15, 2025 date and 8 min read time
Blog page shows 'Read Full Article' button for CEO article
Blog page shows 6 external article cards from real sources (AfriDigest, WeeTracker, EBNet, Unipesa, Fintech Futures)
External article links have target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security
11 external links found with proper attributes to open in new tabs
Footer contains 'Legal & Compliance' section visible in footer
Footer contains all 8 policy links: Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Data Policy, ABC Policy, Code of Ethics, Gifts Policy, AML & CFT Policy, Whistleblowing Policy
Data Policy page (/data-policy) loads correctly with content
ABC Policy page (/abc-policy) loads correctly with 'Anti-Bribery & Corruption Policy' title
Code of Ethics page (/code-of-ethics) loads correctly with content
Gifts Policy page (/gifts-policy) loads correctly with content
AML & CFT Policy page (/aml-cft-policy) loads correctly with content
Whistleblowing Policy page (/whistleblowing-policy) loads correctly with content
All policy pages show 'Last updated: December 2025'
Footer shows correct phone number +254 72 315 4900 in Contact section
Footer links scroll page to top when clicked (scroll from 6640px to 2px verified)
Footer link navigation works correctly (Partners link navigates to /partners)
Mobile responsive design (390px width) - no horizontal overflow on Contact page
Mobile responsive design (390px width) - no horizontal overflow on Partners page
Mobile view shows hamburger menu in navigation
Tablet responsive design (768px width) - no horizontal overflow on Blog page
Tablet responsive design (768px width) - no horizontal overflow on Footer
Tablet view shows all legal policy links wrapped properly in footer

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI update features working correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI updates batch 5 completed: Contact page map removed, Partners page has 8 partner logos (Safaricom, KCB Bank, Equity Bank, MTN, Twiga Foods, Jumia, Glovo, Bolt) with colored backgrounds and initials. Blog page has CEO article by Jason Crawford with 'Read Full Article' expandable section. Footer has Legal & Compliance section with 8 policy links. All legal policy pages created at /data-policy, /abc-policy, /code-of-ethics, /gifts-policy, /aml-cft-policy, /whistleblowing-policy. Footer handleLinkClick function scrolls to top on navigation. Mobile/tablet responsive with no horizontal overflow.

blog_page.ceo_article_title: The Future of Earned Wage Access in Africa: 2026 Trends
